'''3.4.50''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on November 21, 2024.

; Other
* Bug fixes to Java Installations page & general accessibility.
* Improvements & bug fixes to Offline Mode access.
* Various other bug fixes and under the hood improvements.</onlyinclude>
